lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. doesn’t want fans to have to wait to watch Kobe Bryant and LeBron James in the playoffs, so while some teams finish the first round of the playoffs, others have already begun the second.
snippet: The N.B.A. doesn’t want fans to have to wait to watch Kobe Bryant and LeBron James in the playoffs, so while some teams finish the first round of the playoffs, others have already begun the second.
